main.name: Bhabaranjan Panigrahi
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I am a Computer Science graduate student Specializing in Machine Learning. Before starting my master's I was working as a Senior Software Developer. During this time, I worked closely with Data Science and Analytics teams. During my time at the second company, I got an oppornunity to work in a data ingestion project and collaborated directly with the Insight Management Team. I got facinated seeing the power of DL/AI in production. I always wanted to explore this field and this time I decided to make a career in ML and AI.
main.bio2: I am curretly seeking Internship opportunities in the field of Machine Leanring and AI. I want to work on challenging projects in a progressive organization which will provide me a scope to Apply and Grow my skills at the same time.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
